title: Last Week's Top Stories - Conservatives Attack Kamala Harris & Trump Takes On the USPS - Uncensored
itunes:title: Last Week's Top Stories - Conservatives Attack Kamala Harris & Trump Takes On the USPS - Uncensored
description:
Conservatives lash out at vice-presidential candidate Kamala Harris, Pres. Trump tries to sabotage the U.S. Postal Service, and Dulce Sloan and Margo Price call out sexism.
